name: Chicken Marvalasala (Rachael Ray)
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper, and a light dusting of flour on both sides.
Heat a non stick skillet with 2 T. olive oil over medium heat.
Add chicken to the pan and brown cutlets lightly on both sides.
Remove to a platter and cover with foil to hold in the heat.
To the same skillet add  2 T. olive oil and 1 clove garlic.
Cook for a minute or so, then remove and add the mushrooms.
Let the mushrooms brown evenly, until tender about 8-10 minutes.
To the cooked mushrooms add Marsala and let reduce for 1 minute or so.
Add 2 T. butter to finish the sauce.
Slide chicken back into sauce to warm.
